extendedInfo.description: -- This is a Lite version of the actual App --CLICK HERE to find the full version.**** softonic.com review: "While it's validity as a fortune-telling medium is questionable, Best Tarot Pro still provides an interesting diversion and you'll learn quite a bit about how tarot cards work." ****By the Tarot reading, people may be able to find answers about their hopes and wishes. This program uses the 'Celtic cross' card reading. There are 3 different, full, and original decks of the 'Tarot of Marseilles', which is the oldest and most popular. These are the Dodal, Conver, and Noblet decks. There are 78 different cards, 22 major and 56 lesser 'arcana' cards. This program is provided for entertainment purposes only.How it works:1. Make a profile by clicking the 'gear' button.2. Go back and start over.3. Think about something that needs to be analyzed and write it down. Go on.4. You will see all the cards laid down backwards with a question mark over the one analyzed. Click the right icon to go on, or another card to be analyzed.5. You will see the card. Click the question mark to read the meaning or the card to compare it with the same card from another deck.6. Eventually, you will finish the cards and see the overall report. The readings are saved and you can review them whenever you like.FEATURES:1) Completely redesigned with high resolution graphics2) Translated into: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Greek, Russian.3) Three different, full (78 cards each) and original decks of the 'Tarot of Marseilles' (Dodal, Conver, Noblet)4) Can show the same card from different decks, to compare them. (By a simple click on the card)5) Easy to understand explanations.6) 4 different background materials.7) 3 different users with the ability to save up to 7 tarot reading for each.8) Reversed cards and card pairs are explained.

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Bought full version of this app and its still asking me to buy full version the tenth card can\'tbe revealed.not gud !
reviews.author: Shan Mccreary

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Downloaded the trial it was so small couldnt be made bigger.very dissapointed no card descritios etc,go for galaxy tarot pro no dissapointments!!
reviews.author: sekmet hathor

reviews.comment: Trial deceptive! Uses \"imagined danger to life\" meme to ensnare user to purchase. SHAME! Click up arrow on right to select hepful. Keep on top.
reviews.author: A Google User
